Text: It saddens me to say this my Jap porn loving bros, but skip this one for sure. The girl is cute, but the dude is a disgusting fat fuck. This guy is about as in shape as Ron Jeremy, but at least Ron is packing heat. I could forgive that if he kept his shirt on the whole time but he decides to toss it off in the last 10 min. He should jog a little and maybe he wouldn\'t get so exhausted he could keep his shirt on. They seriously need a new guy.
Funny, I never notice the guys in these movies!!!
